How many packages will she have?

If each package has 3 white t-shirts, and mom buys a total of 66 white t-shirts, we can divide the total number of t-shirts by the number of t-shirts in each package to find the number of packages.

Number of packages = Total number of t-shirts / Number of t-shirts in each package
